name: Help Index Document
summary: Learn about .HELPINDEX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: In the Narrator application you can find the HELPINDEX file by following these steps:
Open the Finder window and locate the Narrator application (most likely found under Applications).
Select Show Package Contents → Contents → Resources → English.lproj (or French.lproj or German.lproj) → Narrator Help.
You should see the HELPINDEX file in this folder.

description: Document used by Narrator, a narration audio producing application; contains data indexing HTML files found inside the Narrator application; some data held in the file includes the paths to each HTML help file.
